title: tAyi tandeyenna
sahitya:
tAyi tandeyenna guru daiva nInE krSNa pAhi panjAkSara parama puNya nInE


caraNam 1    kandanu mADida tappu kAyuva nInE rAma kandarpa janakane mOkSa dAtanu nInE
    caraNam 2    aruNa karuNa piDidu karma kaLeya bEko munde maraNa jananavillada padavi sErisa bEko
    caraNam 3    endendigU ninna dAsanAga bEko purandara viTTala caraNavannu tOra bEko
